thread.title: We Can Allow Cybersecurity Research Without Stifling Innovation
thread.title_full: We Can Allow Cybersecurity Research Without Stifling Innovation

title: We Can Allow Cybersecurity Research Without Stifling Innovation
text:
02 We Can Allow Cybersecurity Research Without Stifling Innovation 
Informationweek: Imagine a U.S. economy without Google, Microsoft, and Apple. These organizations rose out of a culture that encouraged innovation and harbored a willingness to embrace new technology and new ways of using it. Today, in the face of advanced cyberthreats and widespread compromise of sensitive data, we must take care not to dismantle this culture in the name of safety.
